about_the_game:
In the distant future, calamity descends from the heavens. A meteor lands off the coast and sends the local ecosystem wild. You take the role of John Sheider, typical Ex-Secret Agent and Highschool Science Teacher. It's your job to seek out research material and investigate the phenomenon, by diving deep beneath the waves.


Explore the coast, searching for new locations in a dynamic world, but take care... you are not alone. Something is affecting the local marine-life, and citizens are going missing.


You're not alone however. Captain Shaw, the Charter boat captain will lend you his nautical know how, and Miss Dreyfuss will lend you her mechanical expertise. Fight in the air, on reel, and sea.


Accessibility Options:
-Auto-fire and Auto-movement settings allow MOUSE-ONLY gameplay with minimal button inputs.
-Full Keybinding/Remapping.
-Edit Cursor colors, along with important overlays.
-Controller support, and thumbstick deadzone settings.
-Dyslexic friendly font, with OpenDyslexic.

This game is planned for full release in the 1st Quarter of 2023. You can follow along with the development @Coleowing on Twitter, Youtube, Twitch, Tiktok, or Instagram.

name: Gravitaws

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May struggle on older laptops
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Everything that's not 7+ years old

short_description: Gravitaws is a retro-style stage shooter inspired by Jaws (NES). Explore a dynamic overworld map. Collect research materials and upgrades, while evading an Alien invader. The story is delivered in classic style cutscenes. Fight bosses, survive, collect, fish, and bomb your way to victory.
